programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: White-Collar Crimes
programme.desc: These criminals may not have blood on their hands, but they still leave despair in their wake. From shady non-profits to fraudulent contractors, to wide-spread postal theft, here are some of the most devastating white-collar crimes to be attempted across the country.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Redemption and Good Clean Fun
programme.desc: Chef Jessy Melo of Jessy’s Clean Meals is back for redemption. Can Chef Nikki Irving, owner of Los Jefes Comida in Taunton, show how she too, can elevate clean and fresh cooking to a higher level or will the blindfold be a game changer?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate it, Pittsburgh!: Between The Bread
programme.desc: In honor of Pittsburgh's love of handhelds, Chef Claudy Pierre and Chef Alex Brown get creative crafting their best sandwich-inspired dishes.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Ballin' in Baltimore: Expert Photographer Devin Allen Shows Angel Baltimore Through His Lens
programme.desc: Angel captures a different angle on Baltimore with activist and photojournalist, Devin Allen. They explore street photography, pop wheelies with a cutting-edge community dirt biking program and enjoy Charm City's most decadent treats.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: All Around The Wait, What Happened World
programme.desc: In this season's finale, Frank Nicotero finds a couple of good sports in New Orleans and Cincinnati. Watch as he revisits the most absurd moments from the first two seasons.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Fundraising Scams
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: DJ Goes In the Air Off the Air
programme.desc: DJ Jenelle “J.Belle” Vannoy is living her dream of working in radio. She worked all over the country before landing in Albuquerque. As the voice of the city but new to the area, her desire to learn more about Duke City has Jenelle ready for adventure.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Oklahoma Girl Scout Murders
programme.desc: As Girl Scouts at Camp Scott settle into their tents one evening, eerie footsteps and distant cries haunt the campers throughout the night. The unsettling sounds turn out to be the echos one of the largest murder investigations in Oklahoma's history.

programme.title: Widowed At 19
programme.desc: Two high school sweethearts had their love story cut too short.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Wild Captures
programme.desc: From a car crashing into a home to a lemur fleeing a DUI scene, these captivating real-life stories explore intense arrests caught on film.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Experience the Illuminating Wonder of Santa Fe, NM
programme.desc: Immerse yourself in Santa Fe, New Mexico's unique charms! Delve into the bizarre art of Meow Wolf, sample a decadent chocolate flight, and savor a local speciality, the green chile burger. Embrace the unusual in this truly exceptional journey!

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Verona- Tiny Yet Mighty
programme.desc: Ed and Day venture to Verona and explore “the spot that’s more than a dot.” The guys play pickleball, dine on BBQ, get creative with splatter paint, and finish the day with a brew.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Mysterious Slayings in a Wealthy Family
programme.desc: Detectives are baffled after a mother and daughter in an affluent family are murdered outside Louisville. A year later, a triple homicide in North Carolina sends detectives on an explosive search, linking the two cases through an unlikely suspect.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: All in the Family
programme.desc: Patrick Shea, Chef and Owner of CK Pearl and Decklyns in Essex and Gloucester and Chef Kladji Plaku, Chef de Cuisine at City Table, City Barn & Solas in Boston engage in a battle of culinary skill. Will a surprise guest judge change everything?

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Rad Realtor Looking for Real Love
programme.desc: Kyle is a Louisville native and real estate agent that is on the market and looking for love. Three single guys will try to sell him a long term relationship by making bourbon, designing hats and taking a trip around the ice rink.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Remix Dishes to Savor from the Midwest
programme.desc: Discover where classic dishes collide to create delightful flavors. From pizza debates to the Juicy Lucy to a good old-fashioned red beer, see how regional creativity transforms beloved foods into something more.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Special Olympics Champ Boogies Through Bucketlist
programme.desc: Chris has an unstoppable spirit, despite the challenges of Down syndrome. His resilience has propelled him to extraordinary achievements, including clinching the gold in Greece. Meaghan takes him on a whirlwind of experiences tailored just for him.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: Acclaimed Screenwriter, Fashion MC, & Hip Influencer Dole Out Top Hot Spots
programme.desc: Why is Kansas City's fashion scene thriving? Craving a horchata latte? Best pizza on planet Earth? Local experts Jordan Gallant, Jasmine Green, and Aaron Rahsaan Thomas have all the answers, including where to go for a new hairstyle and a pep talk.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Modern medicine can work wonders, but sometimes something truly remarkable will take place.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Louisville is Blazing a New Bourbon Trail
programme.desc: Kate learns how to play a Germantown street game, gets up close and personal with handcrafted, hand-charred bourbon barrels, and learns to fall back in love with whiskey – and natural wine.

programme.title: Always Remember Your Name
programme.desc: A documentary of mistaken identity, hope, love, and the power of story by two Holocaust survivors.

programme.title: Chronicle: Quip Town
programme.desc: (2024) An all-access look at the Aliquippa high school football team's journey to repeat as state champions, from training camp through the season, all while battling numerous obstacles.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Chronicle: Pittsburgh After Dark
programme.desc: (2024) In this episode of "Chronicle," we're going to look at the side of Pittsburgh you don't normally see: When the sun does down and the moon comes up.

programme.title: WTAE Chronicle
programme.desc: Looking back on a decade of Chronicles at WTAE and revisiting some of the most impactful stories we’ve told about Pittsburghers.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.desc: Esquire’s Dave Holmes chats with Girls5eva’s Busy Philipps. Dave and Busy play Travels and Tribulations, and Dave shares his Esquire-approved itinerary for things to do in Pittsburgh.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Plate It Picklesburgh
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: WTAE 4 The Record
programme.desc: This morning, a local initiative aimed at tackling drug addiction in our communities and providing resources to impacted families.
